Allergy intolerance substance condition - IPS

IPS Allergy intolerance substance condition value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 762766007 | Edible substance (substance); all descendants of 406455002 | Allergen class (substance); all descendants of 425620007 | Metal (substance); all descendants of 373873005 | Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product); all descendants of 410942007 |Drug or medicament (substance)
